You don't spend ETH as gas You spend ETH on gas  You don't spend USD as taxes You spend USD on taxes  The Ethereum protocol requires payment in ETH for transactions & staking, just as the US required USD for taxes & T-bills  ETH is not gas  Ethereum is an economy ETH is money
